p.k: A look at the tumultuous life and glittering 40-year career of the actress, singer and entertainer
A portrait of Hollywood's quintessential Englishman, whose career included acclaimed roles in films Separate Tables, A Matter of Life and Death and Around
Stephen Fry reads Oscar Wilde's timeless fairytale of love and sacrifice, accompanied by a beautiful animation

p.n: Spielberg and Williams: The Adventure Continues
p.k: A fascinating look at the enduring partnership between composer John Williams and director Steven Spielberg, from Jaws to Indiana Jones and beyond
A magnificent collection of paintings by Lowry is up for sale in London, along with a rare Enigma machine and a biscuit from Ernest Shackleton's 1907 Antarctic expedition
Competition in which budding artists are challenged to paint a scene in four hours
Working Animals The contestants meet working animals employed for assisted-therapy, as they're tasked with capturing the crucial support they give their owners
Depart in Peace Art dealer Lionel gets an artist to visualise his fiancee Janet nude and paint her accordingly. Janet, however, does not see the funny side
My Ladylove, My Dove When Pamela and Arthur invite a young couple over for the weekend, things take a surprising turn

n.u: Karl Ove Knausgard: South Bank Show

p.n: Karl Ove Knausgard: South Bank Show (2)
p.k: Melvyn Bragg meets Norwegian author Karl Ove Knausgaard to discuss his life and work, including his six-volume Min Kamp series of autobiographical novels
A look at the tumultuous life and glittering 40-year career of the actress, singer and entertainer
A portrait of Hollywood's quintessential Englishman, whose career included acclaimed roles in films Separate Tables, A Matter of Life and Death and Around
Taste A dinner party takes a surprising turn when one pretentious guest is challenged to a wine-tasting contest
Skin Derek Jacobi stars in a twisted tale. A man persuades an unknown artist to tattoo a picture on his back. But when the artist becomes famous

p.n: Joe Cocker: Mad Dog With Soul
p.k: Documentary charting the rise of Joe Cocker, a gas fitter who played in Sheffield pubs and was catapulted to stardom following a spectacular appearance
A fascinating tour of London in 1962. Top hats are regulation dress at the Stock Exchange, there's two-way traffic on Bond Street, and Fleet Street
New. A look at how Thomas Heatherwick's unusual and stunning design of many staircases became a mind-blowing tourist attraction in Manhattan, known as the Vessel
A portrait of Hollywood icon Gary Cooper, whose films include High Noon, Sergeant York and Mr Deeds Goes to Town
Portrait of icon Natalie Wood, who appeared in Christmas classic Miracle on 34th Street when she was eight and went on to star in Rebel Without a Cause

n.u: R.E.M.: Video Killed The Radio Star

p.n: R.E.M.: Video Killed The Radio Star VII (1)
p.k: An intimate look at some of REM's most memorable music videos
A look at the work of music legend Neil Diamond, who wrote I'm A Believer for The Monkees, and performed his own hits, including Heartlight and Sweet Caroline
New. It's Brighouse and Rastrick vs Fairey Band as the series kicks off with two of the UK's biggest brass bands going head-to-head at The Whit Friday
Andre Rieu performs his first ever concert in Bucharest and reveals the secrets behind his magical open air concerts, from the construction of the stage
